com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.header

Interface HeaderInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeepAlive

    public interface HeaderInterceptor
    Interface defining the behaviour of a class intercepting the processing of a request. Hooks are provided for pre-processing, which happens before the module consumes the request and for post-processing, which is invoked after the module consumes the request.
    Author:
    vnagpal

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean applicable(HttpContext ctx)
      To be implemented method which tests whether this intercepter is applicable in the given context.
      boolean isValid(HttpContext ctx, boolean writeResponse)
      Performs a validation of the Header syntax in the HTTP request.
      boolean postProcess(HttpContext ctx)
      To be implemented method which is invoked after the module has consumed the request
      boolean preProcess(HttpContext ctx)
      To be implemented method which is invoked before the module gets to consume the request

    • Method Detail

      • preProcess

        boolean preProcess(HttpContext ctx)
        To be implemented method which is invoked before the module gets to consume the request
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context to process
        Returns:
        true if this method has handled the request and sent out the response by itself and no further execution is required, false otherwise.

      • postProcess

        boolean postProcess(HttpContext ctx)
        To be implemented method which is invoked after the module has consumed the request
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context to process
        Returns:
        true if this method has handled the request and sent out the response by itself and no further execution is required, false otherwise.

      • applicable

        boolean applicable(HttpContext ctx)
        To be implemented method which tests whether this intercepter is applicable in the given context. Usually done by checking HTTP Request headers.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the HTTP context
        Returns:

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(HttpContext ctx,
              boolean writeResponse)
        Performs a validation of the Header syntax in the HTTP request. Returns the validity of the syntax of the header in question. Also optionally writes the error to the response. This method should usually be invoked from preProcess and further processing should be terminated in case of invalid Header info.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the HTTP context
        writeResponse - if true, instructs the interceptor to write the error to response if header infor is invalid
        Returns:
